metadata.title: When Humanity Dreams of the Impossible and Takes to the Skies

tracks.text: The Serpent's Apple in Eighthold
Text, 29, When humanity dreams of the impossible and takes to the skies
Katzo, Sunraku, the Psyger sisters, Animalia, and Professor stare.
Pencilgon smiles. Psyger-100 smiles.
Red light rolls right over humans. Green light rolls left over player characters. Rakuro and Sunraku, Towa and Pencilgon, Kei and Katzo, Rei and Psyger-0.
A green tower stands behind a fountain in the middle of a red-bricked town. Day turns to night. Red text, Shangri-La Frontier.
Sunraku stands in the Inventoria
Pencilgon and Katzo stand back to back in the ruins.
A mail bird lands on Psyger-0's arm.
A ninja runs at night through the ruins.
Professor in library
Psyger-100 in town
Emul runs from SF Zoo
Bilac hammers in a forge. Amariys sips coffee. A woman and man stand on a roof near satellite dishes.
A computer sits in the Utopia reference room.
Sunraku flies through the crystal nest fighting scorpions.
Sunraku flies through the Ruins, fighting golems.
A mecha stares up. Blue and red mecha fly around and fight. The pink haired woman is in the red mecha.
A spiky golem in the ruins.
The Gatekeeper's arms glow blue.
A lava crystal scorpion
A blue haired ninja girl makes hand signals.
Sunraku stares up at agiant mountain of metal trash.
Pencilgon swings a golden spear.
Katzo red fist punches the Gatekeeper.
Psyger-0 holds a sword and takes her dark form.
Sunraku wears a mask and holds crystal arm guns.
Clouds cover the moon.
A shadowy wolf lunges from the darkness.
She reaches out a hand.
They stare up at her, exchange glances, then smile.
Sunraku slumps.
He uses a pick axe in the crystal nest. He dodges scorpions.
The rolling hills of the crystal nest glow in the moonlight.
Sunraku runs
He leaps over crystal shards.
A scorpion pursues, exploding shards in its path.
A scorpion blasts in from the right. He rolls and runs left.
He leaps over a shard, drops over a cliff, and lands on an overhang.
Several scorpions descend.
Inventoria
In the crystal nest, he lands on a shard.
The ground shakes. The shard cracks.
A scorpion pincer bursts from below, sending him flying, trailing red pixels.
Sunraku, HP 0
Scorpions watch as Sunraku falls.
Rabituza Inn
Sunraku lies in the bed, glaring at the ceiling.
He logs out.
Rakuro removes his goggles.
He drinks from a Kaiser Energy
He knocks the can off the desk then catches it.
Allows a second mid-air jump.
He drinks
At the Rabituza Inn, Emul opens a door.
The Forge
Sunraku opens an item list and selects Non-Specialized Armament: Converger, Comet Catapult
She removes the headgear
She gets on her hands and knees and dogeza bows.
His face softens
She looks up
She blinks.
Sunraku walks down a hallway
Idol
Eighthold at night
A store sign reads Spell books
Canyon of Ancient Souls
He chases a fleeing wyvern zombie.
A golden chain bursts from Emul's book and wraps around the wyvern's arms
He strikes it in the back. The zombie disintegrates.
He looks behind him.
He leaps above and descends on top of the dullahan, slicing it in half.
Text, Level up, 78 arrow 79

Your skills have evolved. You have learned new skills. New Skills: Cleaver, Ten Counter, Shock wave Fist Level 1, Power slash level 1. Skill evolution: Boundless slash arrow Boundless Massacre, Six Boat Leap arrow Seven Boat Leap
Eighthold alley
She walks through the white door, and it disappears.
In the Canyon of ancient souls, he climbs a cliff.
The crystal nest glitters under a crescent moon.
He picks up a piece of crystal.
He tosses it, and it bounces off crystal shards.
The ground shakes, and scorpions emerge
He runs
The scorpions gain on him.
He approaches a ledge and engages seven boat leap
The scorpions startle, then drag their pincers on the ground, slowing.
The mass tumble over the side.
He equips marsh dagger, and drags it into the wall of the crystal pit.
Dozens of scorpions fall into the pit.
